summary: This is an email chain from August 18, 2019, between FBI supervisory agents discussing coordination on the Epstein case, including liaison roles, a meeting with Mark Epstein about threats he received, and the arrival of a new agent.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.role: Individual receiving threats, brother of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: A meeting is scheduled with him to discuss threats he has received, which appear to be originating from England.

events.title: Meeting with Mark Epstein about threats
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Tuesday morning (August 20, 2019) to discuss threats Mark Epstein has received, which appear to originate from England.

events.title: New FBI agent arrival
events.description: A new FBI agent is scheduled to arrive, get a new vehicle, and be assigned a desk.

keyFacts: FBI agents are actively coordinating on the Epstein case as of August 2019, indicating ongoing investigation.
Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, was receiving threats that appeared to originate from England.
A meeting was scheduled for August 20, 2019, to discuss these threats with Mark Epstein.
The email discusses internal FBI logistics, including the arrival of a new agent and desk assignments.
